imdb.plot outline: In a fun, entertaining and insanely hilarious way, the cast and crew of MAGABOTATO take viewers into the fascinating universe of tabletop and miniature gaming. Each episode contains of games reviews, step-by-step guides for painting or diorama crafting, a news section and some comedy clips. Bringing the world of tabletop and miniature gaming closer to hobbyists and newbies alike - in the most diverting way possible.
imdb.title: Magabotato
plot: A weekly entertainment web show about tabletop and miniature gaming::_Magabotato_ (qv)

In a fun, entertaining and insanely hilarious way, the cast and crew of MAGABOTATO take viewers into the fascinating universe of tabletop and miniature gaming. Each episode contains of games reviews, step-by-step guides for painting or diorama crafting, a news section and some comedy clips. Bringing the world of tabletop and miniature gaming closer to hobbyists and newbies alike - in the most diverting way possible.::Anonymous
